channel.title: [Shard] Smudge-Pkz V1 [Shard]
channel.description:
I decided to start a Shard server, and it's going pretty well. If you want to download V1 just [url=http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,368809.0.html] click here! [/url]
Updates since V1:
[code] Added 2 more shops Some more NPC dialogue Changed Login message Respawning starting items at home ::dungeon, it doesn't work most of the time, will have to fix Got google's client, got some new items in there [/code]
Not too many updates but I just released V1 a day ago, people say I've done pretty good :)
A pic after releasing:
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/1zcplko.jpg[/img]
A vid after releasing:
http://tinypic.com/r/w1ryq8/5
Sorry, couldn't get it into .gif :(
That's all, although I will be adding more!
[b]NOTE: Check out the first DL link for the thread, theres more pics there![/b]

item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“P I M P 3 D Tut, post:12, topic:279654”][quote author=9d n 1 n e link=topic=369046.msg2794054#msg2794054 date=1242950031]

you released this already didn’t you…?

Learn to read.

I decided to start a Shard server, and it’s going pretty well. If you want to download V1 just click here!

gtfo kid grow a tree. i was asking a question.
[/quote]
Grow a tree?
Fuck, What do you say to the kids in school.
“your a fucking panzy ass whiteboy”
“gtfo grow a tree”
“Nigga ima grow a tree right up your ass”[/quote]No nigga ima grow tree up your ass!
